description: This file defines a React functional component 'DemoVideo' that composes multiple scenes with transitions to create a video sequence. It also exports a 'getDemoVideoMeta' function providing metadata about the video. The file imports various scene components, transition utilities, and theming information.

methods.name: DemoVideo
methods.description: Main React component that assembles scenes into a sequence with transitions.

methods.name: getDemoVideoMeta
methods.description: Function that returns metadata about the demo video such as fps, resolution, and frame count.
